Text: Online application issuesJeff I have been researching Enron and understand some of the difficulties with running global applications Many companies have problems with database replication over a wide area network Traditional database replication is great for local area replication within one data center Once you scale to multiple data centers traditional replication is unreliable complicated to set up and manage and very expensive Zembus software was designed to address this exact problem Our data replication and synchronization solution can be used with to n geographically dispersed data centers Zembu also alleviates problems with Global application performance Real time data sharing among multiple data centers application availability Cost effective scaling Zembu can be used for unique log on applications internal andor external applications I like to talk with someone at Enron to see if using Zembu as part of your einfrastructure and architecture would be beneficial to you We can determine this quickly via a brief conference call Who should I speak with Sincerely Fran Compagno Zembu Sherman Avenue Palo Alto CA Office Cell Email Take the Tour Tourzembutourhtml
